type.description:
## Attachable

---


[Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/attachable)

Checks whether the block is in a place where a supported block can be attached (i.e. checks whether any of the adjacent blocks' sides towards this block position are solid).

Type ID: `origins:attachable`

---

### Examples

```json
"block_condition": {
    "type": "origins:attachable"
}
```

title: Attachable (Block Condition Type) date: 2021-04-05

Attachable

Block Condition Type

Checks whether the block is in a place where a supported block can be attached (i.e. checks whether any of the adjacent blocks' sides towards this block position are solid).

Type ID: origins:attachable

Fields

None.

Examples

"block_condition": {
    "type": "origins:attachable"
}
